item.title: Reddit Dissection
item.description: The following is a dissection of a script that iterates through a large .zst file that contains .json data import zstandard import os import json import sys import csv from datetime import datetime import logging.handlers zstandard The module “zstandard” handles files compressed into .zst format os “os” is a built-in module that allows python to manipulate functions involving the operating system json This is a built-in module that allows the manipulation of json files sys Built-in module that allows the Python file to write directly to the command line csv Module allowing the creation and manipulation of csv files logging.

item.title: How to Improve Online Dating
item.description: With the advent of online dating, a torrential flood of products has entered the lives of millions of hopeful suitors. Each service claims its propietary “secret sauce” is superior to their competitors, providing users with more opportunities to meet people they find attractive. However, the problem of online dating is so multivariant that the blanket superiority of one service is nearly impossible… Or is it? Data science and machine learning have revolutionized problem solving in ways that are astounding to most.

Hi, I’m John. Here’s a picture of me at an Aggie Football game with some college buddies: I think it’s ridiculous to try to encapsulate my entire personality into a single paragraph, but I’ll make my best effort. Here’s some details about what makes me tick: ðŸŽº - I’ve played the trumpet for 15 years. That’s probably what I consider to be most special about me, and also the thing I know most about in the world (compared to the average person).

item.title: Entrepreneurial Ideas
item.description: Why do I even care? Do I have the “entrepreneurial spirit?” Like many creative people, I’ve turned my hand to several activities over the course of my life that I felt I could provide an interesting and original contribution. Only recently in the past few years of my life did I realize how accessible the idea of starting a business is… I feel as though I have an entrepreneurial spirit, although that would require I actually follow through on an idea ðŸ˜‚.
